articles.title: Ancient human ancestors actually did live with dinosaurs, according to stunning new research - Earth.com
articles.description: Placental mammals, a group that includes our human ancestors, survived the asteroid impact that killed the dinosaurs.
articles.content: An astonishing new study concludes that human ancestors survived the asteroid impact that killed the dinosaurs. This fact, and other new insights into the timeline of animal evolution, are rocking th… [+7237 chars]
